article_title: Ferragamo creative director Giornetti leaving after 16 years

article_metadata.description: MILAN (AP) - Salvatore Ferragamo's creative director, Massimiliano Giornetti, is leaving the fashion house after 16 years.

og.description: MILAN (AP) - Salvatore Ferragamo's creative director, Massimiliano Giornetti, is leaving the fashion house after 16 years.
